category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: REQ_Microservice_Installed
preference.preference_description: Activates the micro-services based features of "Import Specification using Preview", "Round-trip Import", "Export to PDF" and "Reqiurements History" in Active Workspace. Valid values are: true : User should be able to use all micro-service based features. false: User will not be able to use any of the micro-service based features and import from word and export will follow the traditional way. This is the default value.
